com.theta360.ptp

Interface PtpInitiator

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.lang.AutoCloseable, java.io.Closeable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractPtpInitiator, PtpIpInitiator

    public interface PtpInitiator
extends java.io.Closeable
